column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Zuko says : " Nice work . "
#Text=Katara says : " Aang , this is all my fault . "
#Text=Aang says : " No Katara , it is n't . "
#Text=Iroh says : " Yeah , it kind of is . "
#Text=Zuko says : " Give me the boy . "
#Text=Pirate captain says : " You give us the scroll . "
#Text=Sokka says : " You 're really gon na hand over the Avatar for a stupid piece of parchment ? "
#Text=Zuko says : " Do n't listen to him , he 's trying to turn us against each other ! "
#Text=Pirate captain says : " Your friend is the Avatar ? "
#Text=Sokka says : " Sure is , and I 'll bet he 'll fetch a lot more on the black market than that fancy scroll . "
#Text=Zuko says : " Shut your mouth , you Water Tribe peasant ! "
#Text=Aang says : " Yeah , Sokka , you really should shut your mouth . "
#Text=Sokka says : " I 'm just sayin ' it 's bad business sense .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You 'll regret breaking a deal with me .
#Text=" Katara says : " Thanks , Momo .
#Text=I owe you a bushel of apples .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Aang , are you there ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm over here !
#Text=Follow my voice !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Where ?
#Text=I ca n't find you !
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm right here !
#Text=Never mind !
#Text=I 'll find you !
#Text=Run !
#Text=Katara , you 're okay !
#Text=" Katara says : " Help me get this boat back in the water so we can get outta here .
#Text=" Sokka says : " We 'd need a team of rhinos to budge this ship .
#Text=" Aang says : " A team of rhinos , or two waterbenders .
#Text="
